title: Soul Song
description: Hearing your soul song doesn’t mean you have to listen…Jedda isn’t looking for her heart-mate when she goes to the bar after a hard day training cadets for the Imperial Army. But when a Spy Master on the verge of paying out of the Army approaches neither can deny the pull. Previously published in the Little Gems-Topaz Anthology 2010. __________Approximate word count: 2795
author: Shona Husk
